plot: Villa Quintana is a heartwarming love story that became a phenomenal hit series in the mid-90s. It revolves around the love story of Isagani and Lynette. The series is a modern-day Romeo and Juliet.
plot_en: Villa Quintana is a heartwarming love story that became a phenomenal hit series in the mid-90s. It revolves around the love story of Isagani and Lynette. The series is a modern-day Romeo and Juliet.

title: Villa Quintana
